description: Interface to create instances of TextField and FTETextField. These are re-used so that there are no more than one of each per module factory.

members.description: Creates an instance of TextField in the context of the specified IFlexModuleFactory. of moduleFactory.

values: moduleFactory The IFlexModuleFactory requesting the TextField.
A FTETextField created in the context

members.description: Creates an instance of FTETextField in the context of the specified module factory. May not be null. of moduleFactory. The return value is loosely typed as Object to avoid linking in FTETextField (and therefore much of TLF).

values: moduleFactory The IFlexModuleFactory requesting the TextField.
A FTETextField created in the context
